documents.title: Digital Marketing - Starter Visibility (Client View)
documents.content: Deliverables include: Keyword research for your niche, On-page SEO for up to 5 pages, Google Analytics setup, Basic optimisation of Facebook & Instagram profiles, and a one-time performance report. Suitable for early-stage businesses seeking visibility.

documents.title: Digital Marketing - Starter Visibility (Employee View)
documents.content: Tasks: 2–4 posts, SEO for exactly 5 pages, One-time report, 7–30 support days. Deliver within 10–14 days using SEO checklist v1. Ensure accuracy in keyword mapping and basic on-page compliance.

documents.title: Digital Marketing - Monthly Growth Plan (Client View)
documents.content: Includes full SEO (technical, content, backlinks), weekly long-form content, social media management across 3 platforms, 2 monthly email campaigns, a monthly strategy call and a performance report. Designed for consistent monthly growth.

documents.title: Digital Marketing - Monthly Growth Plan (Employee View)
documents.content: Tasks: 12–25 posts/month, 2–6 video posts, 1–4 blogs, 5–10 SEO keywords, 3–6 ad setups, SLA 30–45 days. Maintain an organised CMS editorial calendar. Maintain weekly updates for SEO tasks.

documents.title: Digital Marketing - Performance Max (Client View)
documents.content: Includes Google & Meta ads management, landing page A/B testing, CRO improvements, advanced analytics dashboard, and retargeting plus funnel optimization. Ideal for performance-driven campaigns.

documents.title: Digital Marketing - Performance Max (Employee View)
documents.content: Tasks: 3–12 ad campaigns, 1–6 A/B tests, weekly analytics reports, SLA 30–60 days. Assign dedicated account specialist. Ensure tracking and event setup in GA4 & Meta.

documents.title: WhatsApp Outreach - Client View
documents.content: Up to 5,000 bulk WhatsApp messages, 2 branded templates, auto-reply setup, follow-up after 48 hours, and a lead tracking sheet. Ideal for fast lead nurturing.

documents.title: WhatsApp Outreach - Employee View
documents.content: Tasks: 1,000–5,000 messages, 1–3 templates, 8–24 hours integration time. Client must provide opt-in list. Follow WhatsApp template approval guidelines.

documents.title: Website Starter Package (Client View)
documents.content: Up to 5 pages using a professional template, basic SEO, and 1 month of post-launch support. Good for quick deployment.

documents.title: Website Starter Package (Employee View)
documents.content: Tasks: 3–5 pages, 1–2 design rounds, 7–21 days delivery. Template-based build. Hosting & domain are add-ons.

documents.title: Business Website Package (Client View)
documents.content: Custom UI/UX, unlimited pages, advanced SEO, Core Web Vitals optimization, optional headless CMS. Suitable for high-performance brands.

documents.title: Business Website Package (Employee View)
documents.content: Tasks: 5–30 pages, 2–5 design rounds, 21–90 days delivery. Include performance best practices and SEO compatibility in Figma and build.

documents.title: App Starter MVP (Client View)
documents.content: One-platform MVP, basic backend, database, and 2 months of post-launch support. Suitable for early product validation.

documents.title: App Starter MVP (Employee View)
documents.content: Tasks: Single platform, 30–90 day delivery, core features include authentication, CRUD and API integration. Detailed scope defined in discovery.

documents.title: Game Development - Prototype (Client View)
documents.content: Playable prototype with core mechanics, basic art, and 1 month of bug support. Good for pitching or early-stage validation.

documents.title: Game Development - Prototype (Employee View)
documents.content: Tasks: Core mechanics → mini levels, 30–90 days delivery. Provide stable build for demonstrations.

documents.title: AI Chatbot Implementation (Client View)
documents.content: Includes chatbot integration for support or lead generation, basic workflow automation and analytics dashboard.

documents.title: AI Chatbot Implementation (Employee View)
documents.content: Tasks: 5–30 intents, 7–30 days integration. Requires API keys + client-provided flows.

documents.title: Blockchain Smart Contract Audit (Client View)
documents.content: Smart contract code review, vulnerability assessment, and a detailed audit report.

documents.title: Blockchain Smart Contract Audit (Employee View)
documents.content: Tasks: 20–80 man-hours, 5–20 day delivery. Includes CI security scans and manual review.

documents.title: NFT Starter Package (Client View)
documents.content: Smart contract, metadata generation, and a basic minting website. Suitable for new NFT collections.

documents.title: NFT Starter Package (Employee View)
documents.content: Tasks: 1–10,000 tokens, 7–30 day delivery. Choose blockchain per project.

documents.title: Creative Package – Logo + Promo Video (Client View)
documents.content: One unique logo with revisions and a short (<30s) promotional video. All source files included.

documents.title: Creative Package – Logo + Promo Video (Employee View)
documents.content: Tasks: 1–3 logo rounds, 15–30 second video, 3–10 day delivery.
